availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph V. Burgess (Mays Lick, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mays Lick, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ellin Lowry Burgess in August 1853. Father of Lucy Burgess, Lillie Burgess, and George Burgess. Farmer in Mays Lick in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mayslick, District 2, p. 63.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Vincent Burgess (1831-1906)," Memorial #158428249, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/158428249 (accessed April 17, 2018).
